name: Run Bola Run
description:
Run Bola Run is my first game (or first prototype).
When I finished my Unity online course just three months ago,
I needed to put all this knowledge into something that
came out of my imagination (like everyone else).

This is the result of hours and hours of dedication after work.
It was an intense three months of level design, art,
game design and programming (my weakest skill,
but I'm working on it). I know this is a simple and short game,
but I think it's fine to be my first step in this world of game development ...
a great world. 

So, enjoy and any comments are welcome to improve this game.

Please, take a minute to make the survey in the QR that is at the end of the game.
